ModMetaData.name: [SRTS Expanded] Planes and Bombs
ModMetaData.author: Asieruso23 and Asierus24
ModMetaData.description:
This mod currently adds some aircrafts to be usable with the SRTS Expanded.
To use with 1.5 version load SRTS FOR 1.5 for 1.4 load SRTS for 1.4, but only load one of them.
Contents of version 1.7:
-New research tab with 32 new techs (WIP) -Own build tab to reduce clutter on build menu. -Adds 75 World war 1/2/Cold War era Aircrafts (More incoming including aircraft up to 2020 ). -Adds 18 new bombs to be used on the planes with different explosion radious and weight. (crafted on machining table once researched). -New take off and landing sounds for Planes/Helicopters including the stuka siren. -Explosion Sounds and effects for some of the new bombs.
